column2: an A.M. Eatery////3. Sweet Potato Pancakes/Upsidedown Pineapple Pancake - One of the best pancake selections in Houston with the Sweet Potato and Upsidedown Pineapple pancake coming out to an even draw. The Pineapple pancake of course sounds awesome
column3: but the Sweet Potato pancake is the surprise selection in their pancake menu. If I had to choose only 1 it'd be the Sweet Potato
column4: but if you're indecisive get one of each and be sure to ask what their pancake of the day is. Sometimes it's awesome...sometimes it's wtf really? (i.e.fajita pancake) Just ask.
